contexts.context: A <mark>Shalk</mark> and a kagouti were strutting back and forth in...
.... "You are the ugliest creature alive," the <mark>Shalk</mark> told the kagouti. "No, YOU are the ugliest...
...the ugliest creature alive," the kagouti told the <mark>Shalk</mark>. For each thought himself most handsome, and...
..., and trainers also rent space here. The Black <mark>Shalk</mark> Cornerclub rents beds to non-guild visitors....
